channel.title: A project i am working on and need help
channel.description:
ok. well 1st. im planning to make some sort of auction place.
1st. i need a command that will teleport me to a like a room that is boxed in and we can start auctioning items. and i want to make that command like ::teleportauction or something.
2nd. a commdand like ::auction (item id) (number of that item) -- this will auction the item up.
3rd. a command like ::bid 1000 --- that would post an offer of 1k for that bid.
4th. and a npc in that room u talk to to get ur cash back.
its gonna be a hard process but we can get to it. i would like all ur help to help me do this. thanks. bowzer.

item.title: A project i am working on and need help
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

ok i have made the ::teleportauction teleport. just need coords. umm does anyone know the coords for like the mime event? so there is stage and seats?

Read full topic

item.title: A project i am working on and need help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

If you do not even know how to create a command that teleports you, I don’t suggest continuing this.

Read full topic
